response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds significant value to both of us, as it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer promptly. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to potentially serving you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 9500}
